name: Pandemic Hero (giabeni)
description:
The world is taken by giant alien viruses that have been infecting the humanity for years...The most expert scientists of the whole world gathered for developing an ultra powered gas, the only weapon capable of defeating the invaders for good. But the viruses were smarter and start chasing all scientists of the group, and eliminating one by one.

YOU are the last one left. Can you escape from the enemies and gather all pieces of the weapon to save the planet? You gotta RUN and SHOOT them!
--------------------

The game concept merges mechanics of mobile infinity runner hits (such as Subway Surfers) and third person shooters. The first prototype of this game was made for Global Game Jam 2021.

--------------------

Made with Godot Engine 3.2.4 beta.
